mapper.select: select * from answer where user_id=#{user_id} and ques_id=#{ques_id}
select * from questions order by rand() limit 1

select Q.ques_id,Q.question,Q.ques_creatime,A.ans_id,A.type,A.name_type,A.user_id,COUNT(A.ans_id) count from questions Q LEFT JOIN (select ans_id,type,name_type,user_id,ques_id from answer where name_type=#{name_type} and type='1') A ON Q.ques_id=A.ques_id GROUP BY Q.ques_id limit #{start},#{end}
select * from child_answer where user_id=#{user_id} and ans_id=#{ans_id} and child_type='2'
select count(*) from child_answer where child_type='2' and ans_id=#{ans_id}
select * from answer where ques_id=#{ques_id} and user_id=#{user_id}

select A.ques_id,A.ans_id,A.user_id,U.profile,U.user_nickname,U.gender,U.birthday,U.province,U.city, A.type,A.name_type,A.content,A.see,A.ans_creatime from answer A INNER JOIN user U ON A.user_id=U.user_id where A.ques_id=#{ques_id} and A.user_id=#{user_id}

select C.child_ans_id,C.user_id,U.profile,U.user_nickname,U.gender,U.birthday,U.province,U.city, C.ans_id,C.child_type,C.content,C.child_ans_creatime from child_answer C INNER JOIN user U ON C.user_id=U.user_id where C.ans_id=#{ans_id} and C.child_type='1' and C.user_id in (#{own_user_id},#{other_user_id}) limit #{start},#{end}
mapper.update: update answer set see=#{see} where ans_id=#{ans_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from child_answer where ans_id=#{ans_id} and user_id not in (#{user_id})

select C.child_ans_id,C.user_id,U.profile,U.user_nickname,U.gender,U.birthday,U.province,U.city, C.ans_id,C.child_type,C.content,C.child_ans_creatime from child_answer C INNER JOIN user U on C.user_id=U.user_id where parent_user_id=#{parent_user_id} and ans_id=#{ans_id} and child_type='1'
